official_title: To require the President to submit quarterly reports through fiscal year 1993 on the estimated cost of resolving the savings and loan crisis and the estimated net new funding which will be required to meet such costs.
short_title: Thrift Resolution Cost Estimate Act of 1990

summary.text: Thrift Resolution Cost Estimate Act of 1990 - Amends the Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery, and Enforcement Act of 1989 to require the President to report to the Congress every quarter on the total cost incurred by the FSLIC Resolution Fund, the Resolution Trust Corporation, and the Savings Association Insurance Fund in connection with certain savings association for which conservators or receivers have been appointed or which are likely to require specified financial assistance.

titles.title: Thrift Resolution Cost Estimate Act of 1990

To require the President to submit quarterly reports through fiscal year 1993 on the estimated cost of resolving the savings and loan crisis and the estimated net new funding which will be required to meet such costs.
